info.name: VoteAPI Comprehensive Collection
info.description:
Complete API collection for VoteAPI - Enterprise Voting & Polling System

Base URL: http://localhost:57788

Includes all endpoints for:
- Authentication
- Elections
- Voting
- Polls
- Users
- Admin
- Analytics
- Notifications
- Bulk Operations
- Export

request.description: Refresh access token using refresh token
Logout current user and blacklist token
